entry.title: bitcoin-dev Digest, Vol 102, Issue 15
entry.summary: Email lists are recognized as valuable tools for staying informed about technical discussions within the community. There is a clear preference for continuing to use an email list platform, indicating its effectiveness in facilitating knowledge sharing and engagement among community members. The desire to migrate to a new email list suggests a need for maintaining this line of communication, possibly due to limitations or issues with the current system. It's evident that there is a collective interest in ensuring the continuity of this resource to support ongoing discourse and collaboration.
